channel.title: [PI] Interface 7

item.title: [PI] Interface 7
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

Okay I am making interface 7 my new tab, how would I be able to add lines of text to it?
I want to be able to click the text and it have a action in ClickingButtons.java… How would I begin?
(Server Sided text modifications)

CLIENT SIDED!
So far this is all I have client sided for this…RSInterface.

public static void donorTab(RSFont[] TDA) { //click the donor button RSInterface tab = addTabInterface(7); addButton(1248, 0, "Interfaces/info/BACK", 13, 13, "Back", 1); tab.totalChildren(1); tab.child(0, 1248, 177, 8); }

Read full topic
